text: Lake View is an unincorporated community in Douglas County, Kansas. It is 1 mile north of Lawrence. ==History== Lake View was created in 1892 as a lake side resort. It was in use until the 1930s. The Lake View club still keeps the oxbow lake. A post office opened in Lake View (but spelled Lakeview) in 1898. It stayed until 1914. Lake View was a station on the Atchison, Topeka and Santa Fe Railway. ==References== ==Other websites== * Douglas County Maps: Current , Historic , KDOT Category:Unincorporated communities in Douglas County, Kansas Category:Lakes of Kansas Category:Bodies of water of Douglas County, Kansas
title: Lake View, Kansas
